desc: Snapguard Solutions the leader in nanotechnology solutions for residential, industrial, commercial and defense industries. Specializing In Nano Ceramic Tint, Snapguard 360 Antimicrobial Protectant, Concrete & Tile Coatings, Durable Water Repellant Coatings, Fabric Protectant, Solar Protectant, Anti-Fog and More.

layout.text: 360° Protection From Bacteria, Germs, & Viruses On Surfaces For Up To 90 days. EPA Registered. Safe For Food Industries, Hospitals, Schools, and More.
